Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.development

Class Paycheck

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.development.Paycheck
All Implemented Interfaces:
AcceptsSupplies, HasStatus
public class Paycheck extends Object implements AcceptsSupplies, HasStatus
A Paycheck can store resources based from their source (strongbox or depot).

    • getAll

      public SupplyContainer getAll()

    • addSupply

      public void addSupply​(WarehouseObjectType wot, DepotID from) throws SupplyException
      Adds the supply to the storage. Information about the source of the object needed. Beforehand the corresponding additionAllowed method is called to check if the operation can be performed.
      Specified by:
      addSupply in interface AcceptsSupplies
      Parameters:
      wot - One of the five types of resources in the game
      from - Source of the supply
      Throws:
      SupplyException - The container cannot accept the supply

    • removeSupply

      public void removeSupply​(WarehouseObjectType wot, DepotID to) throws SupplyException
      Removes the supply from the storage. Information about the destination of the object needed. Beforehand the corresponding removalAllowed method is called to check if the operation can be performed.
      Specified by:
      removeSupply in interface AcceptsSupplies
      Parameters:
      wot - One of the five types of resources in the game
      to - Destination of the supply
      Throws:
      SupplyException - The container cannot remove the supply

    • additionAllowed

      public boolean additionAllowed​(WarehouseObjectType wot, DepotID from)
      Checks if the addition of the supply to the storage, coming from the specified source, is allowed.
      Specified by:
      additionAllowed in interface AcceptsSupplies
      Parameters:
      wot - One of the five types of resources in the game
      from - Source of the supply
      Returns:
      Whether the container can accept the supply or not

    • removalAllowed

      public boolean removalAllowed​(WarehouseObjectType wot, DepotID to)
      Checks if the removal of the supply from the storage, direct to the specified destination, is allowed.
      Specified by:
      removalAllowed in interface AcceptsSupplies
      Parameters:
      wot - One of the five types of resources in the game
      to - Destination of the supply
      Returns:

    • clearSupplies

      public Pair<SupplyContainer,​SupplyContainer> clearSupplies()
      Removes all of the supplies in the Paycheck
      Specified by:
      clearSupplies in interface AcceptsSupplies
      Returns:
      A pair of SupplyContainer containing the removed supplies. The first element contains supplies from the depots, the second one supplies from the strongbox.

    • getStatus

      public ArrayList<Integer> getStatus()
      Allows to receive the status of every object which implements this interface in the form of an ArrayList of Integer
      Specified by:
      getStatus in interface HasStatus
      Returns:
      an ArrayList made of Integer describing what resources are contained in the Paycheck

    • getSource

      public int getSource​(WarehouseObjectType wot)
      Returns an integer that indicates the source of the given WarehouseObjectType.
      Parameters:
      wot - a WarehouseObjectType
      Returns:
      0 if the given WarehouseObjectType isn't contained in any production depot, 1 if there are at least two different given WarehouseObjectType, one from a depot and the other from the coffer, 2 if the given WarehouseObjectType is from a depot, 3 if the given WarehouseObjectType is from the coffer
